_header: Saint Aldhelm the confessor was a man of noble life
Subjects: Aldhelm, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Aldhelm in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Aldelm þe confessour was man of noble lyueIbore he was in
                    engelond þe kynges broþer sone Iue…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝerne seynt aldelm þat he our erande bere
                    soþat we mote to þe Ioie come þat he is on ido

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint aldhelme þe confessour was man of noble lyueI bore he
                    was in ingelonde þe kingis broþer sone yue…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ȝerne seint aldelme þat he oure erande bere
                    soþat we moot to þe opye come þat he is in Ido

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Aldelm þe Confessour was mon of goode lyueI boren he was
                    in Engelond þe kyngus broþur sone yue…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we God and seint Aldelm vr erende þat heo do
                    soÞat we mote to þe Ioye come þat he is Inne i do.
                    A.M.E.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Aldelm þe confessour was man of noble liuey bore he was
                    in engelond þe kinges broþer Iue…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we Yerne seint Aldelm oure erand bere soþat we
                    mote to þe ioye come þat he is inne y do
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint aldelin þe confessour was a man of noble lyueBore he was
                    in Ingelond þe kingis broþeris sone yue…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Bidde we ȝerne seint aldlin oure arende to bere
                    soþat we mote come to þe ioye þat he is Inne I
                    do

OxfTri57.Last Lines:

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Seint Aldelm þe confessour was man of noble liueIbore he was
                    in engelond þe kinges broþer sone yue…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Ich rede þat king & bissop þer of take gode
                    soneNou bidde we Yeorne seint aldelm oure erende bere soÞat we
                    mote to þe ioie come þat he is on ido
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.211-14.

CamKC13.First Lines:
SEint Aldelme þe confessour was man of good lineI bore he was
                    in Engelonde in þe kinges tyme yne…
CamKC13.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ȝerne seint Aldhelm oure erande to bere
                    soÞat we mote to þe ioie come þat he is on i do

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Aldelm þe confessour was man of goede lyueybore he was
                    in Engelonde in þe kynges tyme yue…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ȝeome Seint Audelm oure erande to bere
                    soÞat we more come to þe ioye þat he is ynne ydo

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint aldelme þe confessoure was man of goud lyfbore he was in
                    englonde þe kinges broþer sone yue…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now bydde we seint aldelm oure erand bere soÞat we mot
                    to þe Ioie come þat he is on ydo

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEint Aldelm þe confessor was man of noble lyneI bore he was
                    in engelond þe kynges broþer sone yne
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Now pray we ȝerne Seint Austin þat to cristendom vs
                    broȝteþat we to þe Ioye come to wan oure lorde vs
                    boȝte
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancto Aldelme (f. 93, by scribe in margin beside first line);
                        Aldelmo (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint aldelm þe confessor was man of noble lifibore he was in englond þe kinges broþer sone yue…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou bidde we ȝerne seint aldelme þat our erande bere soþat we mote to þe ioie come þat he is on ido

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Aldeyne þe confessour was man of noble lyveIbore he was
                    in Engelond þe kynggis broþer sone yve…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now prey we fast seint Aldelyn þat he our eraunde bere
                    soThat we mowe to þe Ioie come þat he is in ydo. Amen
